LanguageData.AB_FrostleafToHay.label: dry frost leaf into hay
LanguageData.AB_PropaneToChemfuel.label: make chemfuel from propane
LanguageData.AB_PropaneToChemfuel.description: Make a batch of chemfuel from propane. This is a very inefficient method of getting chemfuel, but useful to get rid of unwanted propane.
LanguageData.AB_RedQuartzToAlcyonite.label: extract alcyonite from rose quartz
LanguageData.AB_RedQuartzToAlcyonite.description: Extract usable alcyonite chunks from rose quartz.
LanguageData.AB_CrystalWoodToMatrix.label: refine crystal wood into matrix
LanguageData.AB_CrystalWoodToMatrix.description: Refines crystal wood into a very resistant crystalline matrix that stores and maintains temperature.
LanguageData.AB_ResinToProcessed.label: refine cordax resin into processed resin
LanguageData.AB_ResinToProcessed.description: Refines raw cordax resin into a thick paste that can be used as a sealant to build tar-related buildings.
LanguageData.AB_ResinToProcessed.jobString: refining cordax resin into processed resin.
LanguageData.GU_MakeStoneBlocksRoseQuartz.label: make rose quartz blocks
LanguageData.GU_MakeStoneBlocksRoseQuartz.description: Cuts rose quartz chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.AB_MakeStoneBlocksCragstone.label: make cragstone blocks
LanguageData.AB_MakeStoneBlocksCragstone.description: Cuts cragstone chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.AB_MakeStoneBlocksObsidian.label: make obsidian blocks
LanguageData.AB_MakeStoneBlocksObsidian.description: Cuts obsidian chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.GU_MakeStoneBlocksMudstone.label: make mudstone blocks
LanguageData.GU_MakeStoneBlocksMudstone.description: Cuts mudstone chunks into usable blocks.
LanguageData.AB_MakeStoneBlocksSlimeStone.label: turn hardened slime chunks into "food"
LanguageData.AB_MakeStoneBlocksSlimeStone.description: Cuts slime stone chunks into semi-edible food.
